remarks: The base set of the loop space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
om1bas.o $e |- O = ( J Om1 Y ) $.
om1bas.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.

om1bas.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` O ) ) $.
om1bas $p |- ( ph -> B = { f e. ( II Cn J ) | ( ( f ` 0 ) = Y /\ ( f ` 1 ) = Y ) } ) $.
$d J f $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
$d f ph $.
